Sentence.sentence: But Oprah's particular brand of celebrity is not a good fit for the values of a university whose motto(座右铭),Veritas,means truth.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Pursuit of knowledge and truth
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: When asked straightforwardly, people tend to lie or shade the truth when the subject is sex, money or employment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There's some truth to all these explanations, but they aren't quite sufficient.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A high-tech test that can tell when a person is not telling the truth sounds too good to be true.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Germany is known for its efficiency and refined engineering, but when it comes to its new ghost airport, this reputation could not be further from the truth.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Now, a company in Massachusetts says that by using magnetic brain scans, they can determine with 97% accuracy whether someone is telling the truth.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Some people told the truth instantly and instinctively.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: That's when I discovered an uncomfortable truth.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: This suggests that they were deciding between truth and dishonesty 一 and ultimately opting for the latter.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"真实"之意。
means: reality ： 侧重指某事物的客观存在的真实性。
truth ： 含义广泛，指符合事实、没有错误或虚假。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tru相信,真实+e→adj.真实的, 真正的, 忠实的
trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]+ful表形容词→adj.相信的, 信任的
tru相信,真实+ly表副词→adv.真实地, 不假
tru相信,真实+ce→相信对方而停战
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
tru相信,真实+ism学术→真实的学术→不言自明的真理
tru相信,真实+th表名词→n.真实,真相;真实性;真理
tru相信,真实+st→n.&v.信任, 信赖
dis不+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→n.不相信,怀疑 v.不信任,疑惑
en给予+trust[n.&v.信任, 信赖]→给予相信→委托

Sentence.sentence: He lost sale of twenty papers because he would not tell a lie, but got a well-paid job because he told the truth.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: One thing is certain: the truth about love is not yet set in stone.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The truth is, after years of balking, I've come to enjoy my walks with misty.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: We've lit up the night as if it were an unoccupied country, when nothing could be further form the truth.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: The truth will not be known for years.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Building on the basic truth about interpersonal influence,the researchers studied the dynamics of social influence by conducting thousands of computer simulations of populations manipulating a number of variables relating to people’s ability to influence others and their tendency to be influenced.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Building on this basic truth about interpersonal influence, the researchers studied the dynamics of social influence by conducting thousands of computer simulations of populations, manipulating a number of variables relating to people's ability to influen
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: In theory, the success of an applicant should not depend on the few others chosen randomly for interview during the same day, but Dr Simonsohn suspected the truth was otherwise.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: It was the purpose and responsibility of great minds to go forth and seek out the truth, which they believed to be founded in knowledge.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The Church's long-standing dogma was losing the great battle for truth to rationalists and scientists.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: This could be no more than a passing literary craze, but it also points to a broader truth about how we now approach the past: less concerned with learning from forefathers and more interested in feeling their pain.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

entry.def: The truth about something is all the facts about it, rather than things that are imagined or invented.

example.ex: Is it possible to separate truth from fiction?…
example.tran: 有可能把事实与虚构分开吗？

example.ex: I must tell you the truth about this business...
example.tran: 我必须告诉你这件事的真相。

entry.def: If you say that there is some truth in a statement or story, you mean that it is true, or at least partly true.

example.ex: There is no truth in this story...
Is there any truth to the rumors?...
example.tran: 那些谣言有什么事实依据吗？

entry.def: A truth is something that is believed to be true.

example.ex: It is an almost universal truth that the more we are promoted in a job, the less we actually exercise the skills we initially used to perform it.
example.tran: 这几乎是一条普遍的真理：我们在某一工作中越往上晋升，实际运用那些当初在工作中经常实践的技能的机会就越少。

entry.def: You say in truth in order to indicate that you are giving your honest opinion about something.

example.ex: In truth, we were both unhappy.
example.tran: 事实上，我们俩都不快乐。

entry.def: You say to tell you the truth or truth to tell in order to indicate that you are telling someone something in an open and honest way, without trying to hide anything.

example.ex: To tell you the truth, I was afraid to see him...
Truth to tell, John did not want Veronica at his wedding.
example.tran: 说实在的，约翰不想韦罗妮卡参加他的婚礼。

means.word_mean: 1. a fact that has been verified;

sentences.sentence: "the truth is the he didn't want to do it"
"they debated the truth of the proposition"
"the situation brought home to us the blunt truth of the military threat"
"he was famous for the truth of his portraits"
"he turned to religion in his search for eternal verities"
"he thought of answering with the truth but he knew they wouldn't believe it"

means.word_mean: 4. the quality of nearness to the truth or the true value;

sentences.sentence: "he was beginning to doubt the accuracy of his compass"
"the lawyer questioned the truth of my account"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English trīewth, trēowth 'faithfulness, constancy' (see true, -th)

sentences.cn: 你认为她在讲实话吗？
sentences.en: Do you think she's telling the truth ?

sentences.cn: 我们决心查出真相。
sentences.en: We are determined to get at (= discover) the truth.

sentences.cn: 实际情况是我们无力继续聘用所有的职员。
sentences.en: The truth (of the matter) is we can't afford to keep all the staff on.

sentences.cn: 我认为你没有把事情的全部真相都告诉我。
sentences.en: I don't think you are telling me the whole truth about what happened.

sentences.cn: 这些谣言毫无根据。
sentences.en: There is no truth in the rumours.

sentences.cn: 她说的没有一句真话。
sentences.en: There is not a grain of truth in what she says.

sentences.cn: 普遍真理
sentences.en: universal truths

sentences.cn: 她不得不正视有关她家的几桩尴尬事。
sentences.en: She was forced to face up to a few unwelcome truths about her family.

sentences.cn: 她虽然又是笑又是侃，但实际上玩得并不开心。
sentences.en: She laughed and chatted but was, in truth, not having much fun.

sentences.cn: 说实话，能回家我会很高兴。
sentences.en: To tell you the truth, I'll be glad to get home.

sentences.cn: 有可能把事实与虚构分开吗？
sentences.en: Is it possible to separate truth from fiction?…

sentences.cn: 我必须告诉你这件事的真相。
sentences.en: I must tell you the truth about this business...

sentences.cn: 这个故事纯属虚构。
sentences.en: There is no truth in this story...

sentences.cn: 那些谣言有什么事实依据吗？
sentences.en: Is there any truth to the rumors?...

sentences.cn: 这几乎是一条普遍的真理：我们在某一工作中越往上晋升，实际运用那些当初在工作中经常实践的技能的机会就越少。
sentences.en: It is an almost universal truth that the more we are promoted in a job, the less we actually exercise the skills we initially used to perform it.

sentences.cn: 事实上，我们俩都不快乐。
sentences.en: In truth, we were both unhappy.

sentences.cn: 坦白说，我害怕见他。
sentences.en: To tell you the truth, I was afraid to see him...

sentences.cn: 说实在的，约翰不想韦罗妮卡参加他的婚礼。
sentences.en: Truth to tell, John did not want Veronica at his wedding.

sentences.cn: 当时我跟彼得跟得很紧.
sentences.en: I was very tight with gets with Peter then.

sentences.cn: 真假参半的谎言最险恶.
sentences.en: A lie which is half a truth is ever the blackest of lies.

sentences.cn: 真理愈辩愈明.
sentences.en: The more truth is debated, the clearer it becomes.

sentences.cn: 我一时心软, 告诉了他真相.
sentences.en: In a weak moment, I told him the truth.

sentences.cn: 他对所发生的事情的叙述没有一点真实性.
sentences.en: There is not the least element of truth in his account of what happened.

sentences.cn: 他的秘密随他一起离去, 现在我们永远也不可能知道真相了.
sentences.en: His secret died with him, and now we shall never know the truth.

sentences.cn: 普遍真理
sentences.en: universal truths

sentences.cn: 这几乎是一条普遍的真理：我们在某一工作中越往上晋升，实际运用那些当初在工作中经常实践的技能的机会就越少。
sentences.en: It is an almost universal truth that the more we are promoted in a job, the less we actually exercise the skills we initially used to perform it.

sentences.cn: 在此，我想分享一下我一路走来所领悟到的一些古老真理。
sentences.en: I want to share these old truths I've learned along  the way.

sentences.cn: 这种辩论的目的不是获胜，而是探究真理，这会让你行动得更快、更远、更出色。
sentences.en: The objective of this debating game is not to win but to get to the truth that will allow you to move faster, farther and better.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 真理: 在中国,商业不能仅仅被看成是金钱和时间的交换.
sentences.en: Truth: Business in China is not be perceived as solely a transaction of money and time.

sentences.cn: 如果你不等待着要说出完全的真理,那末把真话说出来是很容易的.
sentences.en: To be outspoken is easy when you do not wait to speak the complete truth.

sentences.cn: 欧洲专家发现了他的言词包围着宇宙真理.
sentences.en: Savants of Europe have found in his words the ring of universal truth.

sentences.cn: 塔斯基的语义真理论常被当作符合论.
sentences.en: Tarski s semantic theory of truth is often taken as a correspondence theory.

sentences.cn: 一句谚语可有一个基本真理的存在.
sentences.en: An old saw can have a kernel of truth in it.

sentences.cn: “没有了古老而普遍的真理,任何故事都短暂并且注定要失败的” ( 威廉·福克纳 ).
sentences.en: The old universal truths lacking which any story is ephemeral and doomed. ( William Faulkner ).

sentences.cn: 到他们不再怀疑正统说法之日, 便是人类放弃追求真理之时.
sentences.en: When they ( scientists ) stop questioning orthodoxy, mankind will have given up the search for truth.

sentences.cn: 你们相互关心, 你们珍惜自由, 你们崇尚公正, 你们追求真理.
sentences.en: You care about each other, you cherish freedom, you treasure justice, and you seek truth.

sentences.cn: 人类在探索真理过程中必然会遭受挫折.
sentences.en: Man will suffer many disappointments in his quest for truth.

sentences.cn: 因为真理只会透露给那些谦卑的和有所准备的人!
sentences.en: For, the truth will only be revealed to those who are humble and receptive.

sentences.cn: 真理愈辩愈明.
sentences.en: The more truth is debated, the clearer it becomes.

sentences.cn: 知识不仅依据真理, 也依据错误.
sentences.en: Knowledge rests not upon truth alone, but upon errors also.

sentences.cn: 追求绝对真理是错误之源.
sentences.en: There is no such source of error as the pursuit of absolute truth.

sentences.cn: “偏见”竭力想把真理牢握在手心,谁想竟将它捏死了.
sentences.en: Bigotry tries to keep truth safe in its hand with a grip that kill it.

sentences.cn: 说爱情会失去的那句话,乃是我们不能够看成真理来接受的一个事实.
sentences.en: That love can ever lose is a fact that we cannot as truth.

sentences.cn: 只有真正经历过, 仔细体会过, 才明白平淡是真这句话确实是真理.
sentences.en: Only really experienced, careful experienced, they would understand this plain truth are indeed the truth.

sentences.cn: 我使他相信了其中的真理.
sentences.en: I have persuaded him of its truth.

sentences.cn: 他是一个追求真理的人.
sentences.en: He was a seeker for truth.

sentences.cn: 辩论是生出真理火花的铁砧(辩论出真理).
sentences.en: Discussion is the anvil upon which the spark of truth is struck.

sentences.cn: 骗子害怕真理, 蝙蝠怕见太阳.
sentences.en: A swindler fears the truth; the bat dreads the sun.

sentences.cn: 今天你真幸运, 见到了一个赤裸裸的真理本身!
sentences.en: You are really lucky today, saw a naked truth itself!

sentences.cn: 他的工作单位真理部就在一公里开外, 这巍峨洁白的建筑,在肮脏不堪的背景之上高耸入云.
sentences.en: Truth, his place of work, towered vast and white above the grimy landscape.

sentences.cn: 真理脸上有抓伤,真理总被攻击.
sentences.en: Truth has a scratched face.

sentences.cn: 所有成为全人类共识的真理,具有普世价值的真理,也都是磋商的结果.
sentences.en: All the truths accepted by humanity and of universal value are also attributed to consultation.

sentences.cn: 因为其实在真理及是非面前,应该是人人平等, 不能享有特权的.
sentences.en: All men are created equal, nobody enjoys privilege when facing truth and right and wrong.

sentences.cn: 真理面前,人人平等.
sentences.en: Everyone is equal before the truth.

sentences.cn: 我们决心查出真相。
sentences.en: We are determined to get at (= discover) the truth.

sentences.cn: 我认为你没有把事情的全部真相都告诉我。
sentences.en: I don't think you are telling me the whole truth about what happened.

sentences.cn: 我必须告诉你这件事的真相。
sentences.en: I must tell you the truth about this business...

sentences.cn: 真相不可能在几年内水落石出。
sentences.en: The truth will not be known for year.

sentences.cn: 约旦学校的校长: 它叫金罗盘能够告诉你真相.
sentences.en: Master of Jordan: It's alethiometer. It tells the truth.

sentences.cn: 尽管很艰难,但最终还是接受了真相.决定与所遇到的一切做斗争.
sentences.en: You accept the truth, hard as and decide to fight with everything you've got in you.

sentences.cn: 真相终会浮出水面的.
sentences.en: The truth always rises to the surface.

sentences.cn: 政府隐藏了在南极发生的灾难的真相.
sentences.en: The government concealed the truth the catastrophic disaster at the South Pole.

sentences.cn: 我一时心软, 告诉了他真相.
sentences.en: In a weak moment, I told him the truth.

sentences.cn: 有很有力的证据可以证明我们所听到并不是真相.
sentences.en: There's strong evidence that what we were told isn't the truth.

sentences.cn: 我一定要揭露真相.
sentences.en: I will bring to light the truth.

sentences.cn: 他害怕把真相告诉她.
sentences.en: He dreaded telling her the truth.

sentences.cn: 事实真相往往不在表面,而在深层.
sentences.en: Truth lies at the bottom of a well.

sentences.cn: 自己获知真相并不够, 你还要主动告诉别人真相, 回击谣言.
sentences.en: Oneself learn the truth and insufficient, you tell others even actively the truth, fight back rumor.

sentences.cn: 他们被迫说出事情的真相.
sentences.en: They told the truth by compulsion.

sentences.cn: 受害者毫无顾虑地把事实真相告诉给大家.
sentences.en: The victem made no bones about telling the public the truth.

sentences.cn: 我发誓说出真相, 整个真相,完完全全的真相.
sentences.en: I swear to tell the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth.

sentences.cn: 这是一个好兆头, 鹰一直被看做强有力的真相的信使.
sentences.en: That was a good sign. Eagles were always seen as powerful, bringers of Truth.

sentences.cn: 你是这次交通事故的目击者, 你有义务到法庭上讲出真相.
sentences.en: As the eye witness in this traffic accident, you are obligated to tell the truth court.

sentences.cn: 他的秘密随他一起离去, 现在我们永远也不可能知道真相了.
sentences.en: His secret died with him, and now we shall never know the truth.

sentences.cn: 现在发现,或者是让我们为别人揭示一个“难以忽视的真相”,是否悔时已晚?
sentences.en: Is it too late for us to discover and uncover for others An Inconvenient Truth?

sentences.cn: 他真想逼她说出真相.
sentences.en: He really wants to nail her down to the truth.

sentences.cn: 把你的小把戏放到一边,真心地请求我, 我才会告诉你真相.
sentences.en: Listen , if drop the act and ask me honestly, I'll tell you the truth.

sentences.cn: 她决心查明真相.
sentences.en: She's determined to ferret out the truth.

sentences.cn: 与南非及其真相与和解委员会形成对照的是津巴布韦总统罗伯特·穆加贝的野蛮愚昧及其治下的衰败之国.
sentences.en: To Africa its Truth and Reconciliation Commission compare the barbarism and desolation of Robert Mugabe's Zimbabwe.

sentences.cn: 真相在那里.
sentences.en: The truth is out there.

sentences.cn: 真相被揭露出来了.
sentences.en: The truth was dug out.

sentences.cn: 他通过仔细比较和分析研究, 终于得知真相.
sentences.en: By close comparison and analytic study, he finally arrive at the truth.

sentences.cn: 在游戏?女士要力图帮助裁判找出真相.
sentences.en: The woman tries to help judge find the truth.

sentences.cn: 不要粉饰令人不快的真相.
sentences.en: Don't try to dress up the unpleasant truth.

sentences.cn: 有可能把事实与虚构分开吗？
sentences.en: Is it possible to separate truth from fiction?…

sentences.cn: 那些谣言有什么事实依据吗？
sentences.en: Is there any truth to the rumors?...

sentences.cn: 事实上，我们俩都不快乐。
sentences.en: In truth, we were both unhappy.

sentences.cn: 理论上来说，申请者的成功不应取决于当天随机抽选参加面试的其他几名申请者，但是，西蒙逊博士怀疑事实并非如此。
sentences.en: In theory, the success of an applicant should not depend on the few others chosen randomly for interview during the same day, but Dr Simonsohn suspected the truth was otherwise.

sentences.cn: 我在国外从来没有听到过演奏得这么好的美国音乐.
sentences.en: Never have I heard American music played better in a foreign land.
sentences.from: 英汉 - 翻译样例 - 口语

sentences.cn: 你的说法与事实有些距离.
sentences.en: Your story is several removes from the truth.

sentences.cn: 事实是这样一些医疗保健可能可安全的推迟进行,直到你觉得更富裕时.
